main event: A UFO was observed in Yuma, Arizona on 29th May 1957 at 2200 local time (0400 GMT), moving at an estimated speed of over 600 knots and climbing at a steep angle before disappearing behind trees and buildings.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 5 times longer than wide and of light grey color.
No radar or electronics pips were observed, and binoculars were used for the sighting.
The sighting lasted for 6 to 10 seconds, and it was suggested to be a meteor based on the duration and description.
The observation was made by a Yuma TV assistant manager under calm and clear conditions.
The senior director at GOC post in Yuma reported no unusual activity.
sighted object: a longer, light grey UFO moving at high speed
witnesses: Yuma TV assistant manager, senior director at GOC post
